db:abstract.db:para: Configuration class for the Qt Insight Tracker.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: Use QInsightConfiguration to configure the tracker. The tracker reads initial values from a configuration file (qtinsight.conf), which is searched from following the locations in a decending order:

db:listitem.db:para: System configuration directories as defined by QStandardPaths::GenericConfigLocation.

db:section.db:para: Use an environment variable QT_INSIGHT_CONFIG to override the used configuration file.
Example of a JSON configuration file:
A token is used to match the data your application sends to your Qt Insight Organization and you can find your token from the Qt Insight Console.

Some of the configuration items are directly linked to the Snowblow Tracker Protocol, which defines the allowed values. These include QInsightConfiguration::setPlatform() and QInsightConfiguration::setDeviceScreenType().

QInsightConfiguration::setStorageType() can be used to configure the storage type, where SQLITE is the default value and use SQLite database to store the events before they are sent to the back-end server. If an unknown storage type is specified or it is explicitly set to an empty string, caching will be disabled. In that case the tracked data will be lost if the back-end server isn't available.

Two additional storage types are supported: SQLITE-ZLIB and SQLITE-ZSTD. These provide sqlite storage but compress the event data to save disk space. Both zlib and zstd algorithms are used with a dictionary-based compression where the dictionary is created from the first collected events. In general, zstd offers faster compression with higher compression ratio, but requires more memory to train the dictionary.
QInsightConfiguration::setStoragePath() can be used to configure the location of the storage. By default, the SQLite database is created in the application's directory.

QInsightConfiguration::setStorageSize() can be used to limit the number of events that can be cached. When using SQLITE storage type, the oldest events are removed if storage size is exceeded. The default size (0) sets no limits to the storage size.

QInsightConfiguration::setSyncInterval() can be used to configure how often the tracked events are sent to the back-end server. The API takes the value in seconds, while the json configuration file can be configured also with minutes, hours, days, and months. If sync interval is not set, events will never be sent to the backend and cached only in the local storage.

QInsightConfiguration::setBatchSize() is used to minimize the overhead when sending, reading and writing to the storage. When synchronizing the cached data to back-end server, at most QInsightConfiguration::batchSize() items will be fetched at once from the storage and sent to back-end server. This is more optimal, than fetching the data one by one. The sent data will be removed from the storage also in batches. The process repeats, until all data is sent. If one batch fails, the synchronization will stop, as the next batches will likely also fail.

QInsightConfiguration::setRemoteConfig and QInsightConfiguration::setRemoteConfigInterval() can be used to enable the use of remote configurations and configure how often the remote configurations are synced from the back-end server. The API takes the value in seconds, while the json configuration file can be configured also with minutes, hours, days, and months. If QInsightConfiguration::setRemoteConfigInterval() is not set, the interval from QInsightConfiguration::SyncInterval() is used.

QInsightConfiguration::setCategories() allows filtering of tracked events based on the category used in the API calls for QInsightTracker::interaction() and QInsightTracker::transition() events or the attached property InsightCategory::category for the automatic QEvent::type events.
QInsightConfiguration::setEvents() can be used to enable tracking of automatic events from Qt's event system. All valid event types in QEvent::Type can be used.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QString QInsightConfiguration::appBuild() const
db:section.db:para: Returns current application's build version.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] int QInsightConfiguration::batchSize() const
db:section.db:para: Returns current sync batch size.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QStringList QInsightConfiguration::categories()
db:section.db:para: Returns currently enabled categories.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QString QInsightConfiguration::deviceModel() const
db:section.db:para: Returns current device model.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QString QInsightConfiguration::deviceScreenType() const
db:section.db:para: Returns current screen type.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QString QInsightConfiguration::deviceVariant() const
db:section.db:para: Returns current device variant.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QStringList QInsightConfiguration::events()
db:section.db:para: Returns currently tracked events types.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] bool QInsightConfiguration::isValid()
db:section.db:para: Returns true if configuration is valid.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QString QInsightConfiguration::platform() const
db:section.db:para: Returns current platform.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] bool QInsightConfiguration::remoteConfig() const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if remote configuration sync is enabled.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] int QInsightConfiguration::remoteConfigInterval() const
db:section.db:para: Returns current remote configuration sync interval in seconds.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QString QInsightConfiguration::server() const
db:section.db:para: Returns current back-end server address.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] void QInsightConfiguration::setAppBuild(const QString &appBuild)
db:section.db:para: Set application's build version appBuild.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] void QInsightConfiguration::setBatchSize(int batchSize)
db:section.db:para: Set sync batch size to batchSize. Defines how many events are sent to network in one go.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] void QInsightConfiguration::setCategories(const QStringList &categories)
db:section.db:para: Set list of enabled categories to categories.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] void QInsightConfiguration::setDeviceModel(const QString &deviceModel)
db:section.db:para: Set device model to deviceModel.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] void QInsightConfiguration::setDeviceScreenType(const QString &deviceScreenType)
db:section.db:para: Set device screen type to deviceScreenType.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] void QInsightConfiguration::setDeviceVariant(const QString &deviceVariant)
db:section.db:para: Set device variant to deviceVariant.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] void QInsightConfiguration::setEvents(const QStringList &events)
db:section.db:para: Set list of tracked event types to events. All valid event types in QEvent::Type can be used.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] void QInsightConfiguration::setPlatform(const QString &platform)
db:section.db:para: Set platform to platform

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] void QInsightConfiguration::setRemoteConfig(bool enabled)
db:section.db:para: Set remote configuration sync state to enabled.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] void QInsightConfiguration::setRemoteConfigInterval(int syncInterval)
db:section.db:para: Set remote configuration sync interval to syncInterval seconds.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] void QInsightConfiguration::setServer(const QString &server)
db:section.db:para: Set server address to server.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] void QInsightConfiguration::setStoragePath(const QString &storagePath)
db:section.db:para: Set storage path to storagePath.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] void QInsightConfiguration::setStorageSize(int storageSize)
db:section.db:para: Set storage size to storageSize.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] void QInsightConfiguration::setStorageType(const QString &storageType)
db:section.db:para: Set storage type to storageType.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] void QInsightConfiguration::setSyncInterval(int syncInterval)
db:section.db:para: Set sync interval to syncInterval seconds.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] void QInsightConfiguration::setToken(const QString &token)
db:section.db:para: Set server token to token.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] void QInsightConfiguration::setUserId(const QString &userId)
db:section.db:para: Set user identifier to userId. If userId is empty, a generated random UUID will be used.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QString QInsightConfiguration::storagePath() const
db:section.db:para: Returns current storage path.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] int QInsightConfiguration::storageSize() const
db:section.db:para: Returns current storage size.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QString QInsightConfiguration::storageType() const
db:section.db:para: Returns current storage type.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] int QInsightConfiguration::syncInterval() const
db:section.db:para: Returns current sync interval in seconds.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QString QInsightConfiguration::token() const
db:section.db:para: Returns current server token.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QString QInsightConfiguration::userId()
db:section.db:para: Returns current user identifier used in the tracked events.
